
---
title: '3599 元起，鼎桥 M40 5G 手机高配版今日开售：内含充电套装 + 90Hz 屏'
categories: 
 - 新媒体
 - IT 之家
 - 热榜
headimg: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/5/15c6d37b-0d20-468c-8412-733e63cc9b5e.png'
author: IT 之家
comments: false
date: Wed, 10 Aug 2022 23:31:56 GMT
thumbnail: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/5/15c6d37b-0d20-468c-8412-733e63cc9b5e.png'
---

<div>   
<p data-vmark="d697"><a class="s_tag" href="https://www.ithome.com/" target="_blank">IT之家</a> 8 月 11 日消息，鼎桥通信于 8 月 3 日推出了 TD Tech M40 高配版手机。该机 8GB+128GB 售价 3599 元，8GB+256GB 售价 3999 元，<strong>将于今日 10:08 正式开售</strong>。</p><p data-vmark="2ebd" style="text-align: center;"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/5/15c6d37b-0d20-468c-8412-733e63cc9b5e.png" w="1010" h="771" alt="鼎桥 M40" title="3599 元起，鼎桥 M40 5G 手机高配版今日开售：内含充电套装 + 90Hz 屏" width="1010" height="626" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="5899">IT之家了解到，相较于此前发布的标准版机型，<strong>鼎桥 M40 高配版内含充电套装，且屏幕刷新率为 90Hz</strong>。</p><p data-vmark="ea46">官方信息显示，鼎桥 M40 厚 8.8mm，重 188g，<strong>采用 6.5 英寸 OLED 曲面屏</strong>，搭配玻璃后盖，拥有釉白、秘银、亮黑三款配色，外观与华为 Mate 40 相似。</p><p data-vmark="27b7" style="text-align: center;"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/5/8275e214-7d5c-4949-8e9e-c042df06fa6f.png" w="1440" h="940" alt="鼎桥 M40" title="3599 元起，鼎桥 M40 5G 手机高配版今日开售：内含充电套装 + 90Hz 屏" width="1440" height="535" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="fb1b">配置方面，鼎桥 M40 <strong>搭载天玑 1000 + 处理器</strong>，支持 5G 双卡双待，内置 4200mAh 电池，<strong>支持 40W 有线快充与 40W 无线快充</strong>，配备立体声双扬声器、3.5mm 耳机孔，同时支持 IP53 防尘防水。</p><p data-vmark="db0b" style="text-align: center;"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/5/b8204184-fdcb-4f1d-a605-91f282ef329e.png" w="913" h="772" alt="鼎桥 M40" title="3599 元起，鼎桥 M40 5G 手机高配版今日开售：内含充电套装 + 90Hz 屏" width="913" height="693" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="864e">影像方面，鼎桥 M40 前置 1300 万像素广角镜头，后置 6400 万像素超感知广角镜头 + 800 万像素长焦镜头 + 1600 万像素超广角镜头组合，可拍摄 2.5cm 超级微距。</p><dir><a contenteditable="false" href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-androidurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BAN8JK1olXDYCVV9cC0wWCmgBHF8lGVlaCgFtUQ5SQi0DBUVNGFJeSwUIFxlJX3EIGloUXgEDXVlUD08IWipURmsRQ25-Ky4CYyluADRMeCRmWkNYIw0bBEcnBm8JGlkVWgIAUm5eCkwVBWsNGFwlPmFsCAdZdRRMeS04GVoWXAcAZAgzCEoWAm4JHlgRVTYCV1lZCk4fA28MK1sSWQ4HXF1cAEIWAmc4G1MSbVpABh8fOHsnAF84K1slXjZcOl8OAUxDBGgBdQYSD05CHRpUZksSBWoIG1wTWzYAVV9fCnsn" data-hosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-uwpurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=%2fpages%2funion%2fproxy%2fproxy%3fspreadUrl%3dhttps%253a%252f%252funion-click.jd.com%252fjdc%253fe%253d%2526p%253dJF8BANoJK1olXDYCVV9cC0wWCmgBHF8lGVlaCgFtUQ5SQi0DBUVNGFJeSwUIFxlJX3EIGloUXgEDXVlUD08IWipURmt-Q1JHN18Vay5jX2pRTR9FW0Z5EiUtBEcnAGgBElwlXgQFVlhZDUgQMwxvdQdMWXtdDyQfOEkWBm4JE2tDMwYDVV9cCU4UB2c4G1gUXwACU15VAHsXBGsAHlMWXA4LV19dOEsfBF9UWQlUHzYyZF1tOHsXM2w4RTUUDgEHXF9UWCVKBD1AWxJeA2gCUVhZDUwSB204GVoUXwQyZA%26EA_PTAG%3d17078.27.380" data-jdid="100026086865"><span class="card main-site"><span class="card-logo"><img src="https://img14.360buyimg.com/pop/jfs/t1/157854/20/26773/175717/62e2a32dE34b660b7/da91b4732fbf4c2e.jpg" title="3599 元起，鼎桥 M40 5G 手机高配版今日开售：内含充电套装 + 90Hz 屏" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></span><span class="card-info"><span class="card-title"><span class="mall-data">京东</span><span class="card-name">鼎桥 / TD Tech M40 智能手机 8GB+256GB 秘银色</span></span><span class="card-abstract"></span><span class="card-controls"><span class="price"> 3899 元</span><span </div>
